message_1: In a group of 4 players playing the Dictator Game, player 1 has $100 and must decide how much to share with player 2. Player 2 must then decide how much, if any, to give to player 3. Player 3 must then decide how much, if any, to give to player 4. How much money will player 4 end up with if player 1 decides to give player 2 $40 and player 2 decides to give player 3 $10, and player 3 chooses to keep all the money?
message_2: Player 4 will end up with $0 since player 3 decided to keep all the money and did not share any with player 4.
